summary: Iteration 7 - All 3 user-reported bugs VERIFIED FIXED. 1) Contact page social links now fetch from /api/config and point to REAL URLs (email: shrunitshirke2004@gmail.com, linkedin: shrunit-shirke, instagram: orbya_shirke, youtube: @orbyashirke), 2) Admin panel now has arc reactor cursor (CursorWrapper always adds portfolio-cursor class), 3) Cursor stays visible on video thumbnails (ReticleCursor only hides over iframe elements). Also fixed CSS specificity issue for iframe cursor.
passed_tests: Contact page Email link href starts with 'mailto:shrunitshirke2004@gmail.com'
All social links have target='_blank' (open in new tab)
Contact page fetches social links from /api/config endpoint
ReticleCursor component renders on Admin page (before login)
ReticleCursor component renders on Admin page (after login)
Admin panel body maintains 'portfolio-cursor' class after login
All 8 admin tabs visible (projects, skills, media, stats, quotes, config, colors, messages)
Work page shows 6 project cards with visible thumbnails
Video modal iframe has autoplay=1 in URL
Video modal iframe allow attribute includes 'autoplay'
iframe cursor is 'auto' after CSS specificity fix
ReticleCursor stays visible when hovering over project thumbnails
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 user-reported bugs are FIXED: 1) Contact.js fetches social links from /api/config dynamically (config.social.email/linkedin/instagram/youtube), 2) CursorWrapper in App.js always adds 'portfolio-cursor' class (no admin route exception), 3) ReticleCursor.js checkIframeProximity only checks 'iframe' elements (removed video/embed/object), 4) index.css has '.portfolio-cursor iframe' with higher specificity for cursor:auto. Arc reactor cursor visible on all pages including admin.

bug_fixes_verified.social_links_fixed: VERIFIED - Contact page fetches real URLs from /api/config: email=shrunitshirke2004@gmail.com, linkedin=linkedin.com/in/shrunit-shirke, instagram=instagram.com/orbya_shirke, youtube=youtube.com/@orbyashirke
bug_fixes_verified.admin_cursor_fixed: VERIFIED - Admin page body HAS 'portfolio-cursor' class, ReticleCursor renders on /admin both before and after login
bug_fixes_verified.video_cursor_fixed: VERIFIED - ReticleCursor only hides over iframe elements, stays visible on video thumbnails and video elements

css_fix_applied.change: Added '.portfolio-cursor iframe' selector with higher specificity to ensure cursor:auto works on iframes inside portfolio-cursor context
css_fix_applied.reason: Original 'iframe { cursor: auto }' was being overridden by '.portfolio-cursor * { cursor: none }' due to higher specificity
